name: Aegis of Abyssal Flame
description:
Provide 2 Shield points to the character to which this card is attached.
After said Shield points are depleted: Deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters.
descriptionraw: Provide <color=#FFFFFFFF>2 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> points</color> to the character to which this card is attached.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After said {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}Shield points are depleted:</color> Deal 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing characters.
